immersive_scaler.tooltip_target_height: Target height of the avatar in meters
immersive_scaler.tooltip_upper_body_percentage: Percentage of height from eyes to feet that should be upper body
immersive_scaler.tooltip_custom_scale_ratio: VRChat's arm ratio - controls IK arm length (default: 0.4537, lower = longer arms)
immersive_scaler.tooltip_arm_thickness: How much arm thickness to maintain (0% = scale fully, 100% = keep original)
immersive_scaler.tooltip_leg_thickness: How much leg thickness to maintain (0% = scale fully, 100% = keep original)
immersive_scaler.tooltip_thigh_percentage: Percentage of leg that is thigh (10-90%)

immersive_scaler.tooltip_apply_hip_fix: Apply hip bone fix during avatar build
immersive_scaler.tooltip_upper_body_use_legacy: Use legacy upper body calculation method
immersive_scaler.tooltip_upper_body_use_neck: Measure upper body to neck instead of head
immersive_scaler.tooltip_upper_body_torso_use_neck: Use neck for torso measurement in upper body calculation
immersive_scaler.tooltip_arm_thickness_component: How much arm thickness to maintain when scaling
immersive_scaler.tooltip_leg_thickness_component: How much leg thickness to maintain when scaling
immersive_scaler.tooltip_thigh_percentage_component: Percentage of leg that should be thigh vs calf
immersive_scaler.tooltip_center_avatar: Center avatar at world origin (X=0, Z=0)
immersive_scaler.tooltip_extra_leg_length: Additional leg length below the floor
immersive_scaler.tooltip_use_relative_proportions: Use relative proportions mode instead of upper body percentage

immersive_scaler.tooltip_apply_hip_fix_component: Apply hip bone fix during avatar build

tooltips.component_toggle: Allow toggling components by clicking their icons

tooltips.tree_lines: Draw lines connecting parent and child objects

tooltips.layer_labels: Show layer names next to objects

tooltips.preview_colliders: Show collider visualization in scene view
